title: Research Topic: Constitutional Cryptography Development: Estonia's Digital Democracy Model (2014-2025)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Constitutional Cryptography Development: Estonia's Digital Democracy Model (2014-2025)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Investigate Estonia's comprehensive implementation of constitutional cryptography with dual RSA/ECC key pairs for 1.3 million citizens, 1.3 billion digital signatures, and 2% GDP savings while providi... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
